actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Committee on Public Works and Transportation discharged in House.
Rereferred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to direct the Attorney General to provide for the construction of a correctional center in Los Angeles County, California.

summary.text: Directs the Attorney General to provide for the construction of a correctional center in Los Angeles County, California, such facility to be capable of accommodating at least 500 Federal detainees.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Attorney General to provide for the construction of a correctional center in Los Angeles County, California.
